tips: C1 requires mastery of nuanced language - read sophisticated German texts daily
Practice synthesizing information from multiple sources in writing
The speaking exam tests negotiation skills - practice reaching compromises
Master Wissenschaftssprache (academic German) including Nominalstil and complex connectors
telc C1 emphasizes authentic, practical language use in professional contexts
